DOC.brief_summary: ELUTES European multicenter , randomize , control , triple-blinded study design evaluate ability Paclitaxel Eluting V-Flex Plus coronary stent reduce restenosis coronary artery .
DOC.criteria: Patient must eligible undergo plan treatment single de novo lesion native coronary artery . Patient must acceptable candidate coronary artery bypass surgery . Patient legal guardian must sign informed consent . Patient agree return one month office visit ass cardiovascular status 6 month office visit ass cardiovascular status diagnostic angiogram . Patient must less 18 year old . Patient history bleed diathesis coagulopathy refuse blood transfusion . Patient simultaneously participate another investigative interventional cardiovascular device drug study . Patient known hypersensitivity contraindication aspirin , clopidogrel , stainless steel , sensitivity contrast dye . Women child bear potential . Patient medical condition may cause noncompliance protocol , confound result , associate limited life expectancy . Patient diagnose myocardial infarction within 72 hour prior procedure .
